titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 1467) to extend the funding levels for aviation programs for 60 days.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-293, by Mr. Reynolds.
Rule provides for consideration of S. 1467. makes in order a motion to strike al after the enacting clause of the Senate bill and to insert the text of H.R. 1000 as passed by the House.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 103.

bill.summary: 8/5/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of S. 1467 (aviation programs funding extension).
